thread.title: Malaysia outlaws 'fake news' ahead of elections

title: Malaysia outlaws 'fake news' ahead of elections
text:
Malaysia outlaws 'fake news' ahead of elections 7:15am EDT - 01:28 
Malaysia's parliament has approved a new law for publishing and sharing false information on digital platforms and social media, but critics are concerned the law could impact free speech. Ed Giles reports.
